body_text: Why does Konata call Kagami Kagamin? Every now and then, Konata calls Kagami Kagamin. Why? Does this change the meaning of the name?

What does the word "Akarin" mean? The word Akarin seems related to the fact that Akari is considered as a transparent person. As an example, every time Akari becomes transparent, the word Akarin appears.

What's more, Akari seems to dislike this word.
What does Akarin means? What is its etymology?
